/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architectural styles ranging from modern to traditional, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings.
